data.name: DriveVRX- Car Racing Game & Car Driving Game
data.app_name: DriveVRX- Car Racing Game & Car Driving Game
data.description:
"Drive VRX" is a Thrilling virtual reality racing game that will take you on a high-speed journey through some of the world's most challenging and breathtaking race tracks. With its stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, this game will transport you to a world of high-performance vehicles and heart-pounding competition.
From the moment you put on your VR headset, you'll be fully immersed in the world of "Drive VRX." And with its realistic physics engine, "Drive VRX" delivers a true-to-life racing experience that will leave you breathless.
But "Drive VRX" isn't just about racing. It's also about customization and strategy. You'll also need to strategize and plan your race, making split-second decisions about when to brake, when to accelerate, and how to navigate through hairpin turns and treacherous obstacles.
